member.name: M:Telerik.Pivot.Adomd.DefaultAdomdClient.GetMeasureGroupsAndCaptions(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets MeasureGroups from the specified connection.
member.param: The connectionString used by AdomdDataProvider to connect to OLAP Cube.
Query that will be executed on OLAP Server and will return MeasureGroupsAndMeasureCaptions.
member.returns: Dictionary with MEASUREGROUP_NAME as key and MEASUREGROUP_CAPTION as value. If a caption for MEASUREGROUP_NAME doesn't exist in the returned xml, whole pair is skipped.
